i have some problems with the sevond part:The Girl Who Played With Fire

audio is earlyer then video.
please help me what can i do to fix this

@movelikeme1

Use Media Player Classic > Options > Inside filter > Audio Switcher > Audio time shift 

you can controll the Audio speed.

Once you got the right time,  then you can also use  TsMuxeR  you can burn TS files with time shift changed as you like. This is what I always do when auido doesn't fit.

Just a little note for the OCD guys. The first movie has little framedrops at the very beggining, you can notice them. The first one is really wide and great and the others two are 16:9. Thanks for the upload though, it's good to share.
